bluespicecategorymanager: Page title for special page of category manager
bluespicecategorymanager-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:ExtensionInfo}} Special:ExtensionInfo], description of category manager extension
action-categorymanager-viewspecialpage:
{{doc-action|categorymanager-viewspecialpage}}
Label for denied page access, with name of special page
bs-categorymanager-draganddrop-text: Hint for the user when dragging a tree node
bs-categorymanager-dlg-new-title: Title of dialog window that allows creation of new category
bs-categorymanager-dlg-new-prompt: Label of the input field for the new category name
bs-categorymanager-removecategoryconfirm: Prompt message in case a user tries to delete a category
Title of the prompt that is shown to the user before a category gets deleted
bs-categorymanager-addcategory-dialog-er: Title of the error dialog if something went wrong at new categorie
bs-categorymanager-action-show-category: The action in the action column to open this category in a new tab/window.
right-categorymanager-viewspecialpage:
Grants access to the special page [[Special:BlueSpiceCategoryManager]].
{{doc-right|categorymanager-viewspecialpage}}
bs-categorymanager-collection-type-categ: Label for source type "categorizedpages" in entry field "type"
bs-categorymanager-collection-var-catego:
Label for entry field "categorizedpages"
{{Identical|Pages with categories}}
bs-categorymanager-collection-var-uncate:
Label for entry field "uncategorizedpages"
{{Identical|Pages without categories}}
bs-categorymanager-rename-category: Label for the icon in the category manager to rename a category. Also Used in the dialog as title.
bs-categorymanager-rename-category-new-n: Label for the text field where the user enters a new category name.
bs-categorymanager-move-new-name: Info message druging the renaming process that the category is renamed. At the end the new category name is displayed.
bs-categorymanager-replace-in-pages: Info message druging the renaming process that a page with the old category is renamed. At the end the pagename will be displayed.
